title: The most important interpretations of seeing tomatoes in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Tomatoes in a dream for a married woman Tomatoes are one of the plants known all over the world, not only for their distinctive shape and beautiful colors, but also for their wonderful and delicious taste. Tomatoes in a dream for a married woman Tomatoes are very popular and diverse in our lives. They are considered one of the most delicious foods known, regardless of their distinctive shape. Therefore, seeing them in a dream is one of the things that requires positivity and optimism. And the woman who sees this should be happy because of its connotations that many jurists have confirmed. Interpretation of a dream about tomatoes for a married woman: It is on a date with happy and peaceful days in which he will find a lot of joy, in addition to many happy occasions in which he will be a fundamental factor. Tomatoes in a dream for a married woman in Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing tomatoes in a dream is one of the things that carry many distinctive connotations, which are as follows. While the married woman who notices the use of a lot of tomatoes in her dream interprets this vision as she will enjoy good health and a long life with her children and husband in their happy home. While the woman who sees tomatoes ripe and fruitful in their harvest season, this indicates the end of her worries and frees her from the sadness and constant pain that caused her and her many problems with her family members. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google for the site about the secrets of interpreting dreams, which includes thousands of interpretations by senior scholars of interpretation. Tomatoes in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman dreams that she is buying tomatoes, this symbolizes that she will find great ease in giving birth to her child and will never be sad or sad, as the vision promises her that she will not need To these serious operations. The arrival of her son, but it is likely to come quietly and very naturally. Also, the pregnant woman who sees tomatoes in her dream symbolizes that she will be able to find abundant resources and means of living that will help her in the upcoming expenses related to increasing the number of her beautiful family members comfortably without feeling distressed or suffering. From large financial resources. Crises that she cannot face easily. While the pregnant woman appears pressed tomatoes in her sleep, her vision indicates that her ambitions and desires will soon be fulfilled, after making many attempts for her, which made her lose hope, but God Almighty is able to succeed her with ease. Buying tomatoes in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees that she is buying tomatoes, this indicates that she will get rid of most of the problems and conflicts that occurred between her and her husband in the previous days, which threatened the continuation of their marriage and relationship. Between them, but thanks to her wisdom and sobriety of mind, she will be able to rein in the matter and deal with it rationally. A pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she is buying tomatoes, this vision indicates that she will enjoy good health after the birth of her expected child, in addition to that she will be sure of the safety of the newborn and his arrival to life safely. title: Interpretation of a dream about menstruation for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about menstruation for a single woman: seeing menstruation in a dream causes panic, and on the other hand, many dream interpreters have confirmed that seeing menstruation in a dream is one of the visions that has good significance, including obtaining goodness and abundance. From eating and freedom from difficulties and judgments, rather, the girl is accompanied by fear and anxiety, and this article explains the dream of the menstrual cycle for a single woman. Follow us.Menstruation in a dreamThe interpretation of a dream about menstruation is an indication that the dreamer will be able to get rid of the negative feelings that dominate him in addition to making a new beginning with new goals to achieve. Seeing contaminated menstrual blood is a sign that you will become a partner of many companies in the coming period and reap many benefits. Life the way she always wanted to get rid of the anxiety and fear that control her in this form. Menstruation in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: Seeing menstrual blood is good for a man; Because he earns a lot of money in addition to finding work and satisfying his desires. Black menstrual blood in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will face many problems in the coming period and it is important to know how to deal with it. And finding quick solutions to this, seeing menstruation in the form of dark parts indicates that the dreamer in the future will go through a difficult period that will make him lose his activity and make him despair, and Ibn Sirin showed that seeing menstrual blood in a man’s dream is a sign that he will live a stable married life. The simple drop of menstrual drops is evidence of the fulfillment of all desires that were impossible in the past. Clothes are a sign that you are facing many problems, but if there are drops of blood, it simply means entering into a new partnership with new people. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation for unmarried women: Seeing menstrual blood on individual clothes is a sign that it is the main cause of the problems you are facing In her life, in addition to the reckless woman. She will be exposed to pressure and oppression from those close to her. Anxiety and fear of being late and thinking about going to the doctor. Menstruation for one girl is evidence of the need to be careful in her words and actions because she always puts herself in difficult situations. Return to God Almighty and repent. Read any. In this article we learned about the interpretation of menstrual dreams for single women. We hope that You have benefited from and enjoyed this article.

title: Interpretation of a dream about escaping from dogs for single people

preview.html: He points out that an unmarried woman who got rid of the presence of dogs shows that she got rid of a very sad and stressful issue that was going on for a short period in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing dogs running in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she sees dogs in a dream and they are running after her But he was able to escape from them in the dream and was afraid. It appears that the dreamer will go through something very difficult in her life during this time. But he will succeed in getting rid of her, God willing. And seeing a single girl in a dream sees many dogs standing in front of her in the middle of the road. He could not escape from them. Or skipping them in a dream. It indicates that there are people close to the dreamer, and they are trying to put her in many problems and mistakes in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Either seeing a lonely girl in a dream when seeing dogs looking at her in a dream. He was very afraid and worried about them in The dream. The meaning here indicates that this single girl who is dreaming will face a very important issue in her life, in which she will feel a lot of anxiety and fear. See also: Interpretation of seeing dogs escaping in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of seeing dogs in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in a dream that she is looking at Many dogs are sitting inside her house, and she was able to escape from them in the dream. The interpretation explains that this married woman will face many problems in her life and her family during this time but she will succeed in getting rid of them. Either the married woman who sees in the dream that many dogs were very close From her and she could not stay away from her in the dream. It is interpreted that this woman who is dreaming will face many things that make her very sad in the dream during this period, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Also seeing a married woman in a dream means that she was looking for a way out to get rid of the dogs that were waiting for her outside and she was Very afraid. This indicates that this dreaming married woman will witness something very difficult in her life. She will not be able to get rid of it or get over it anytime soon. Interpretation of seeing dogs running in a dream for a divorced woman: If the divorced woman sees in a dream that her ex-husband was helping her get rid of Dogs. And escaping from them in a dream without anything happening to her. This indicates that this divorced woman will be freed from all sad things. And what is annoying is that it causes disagreements between her and her ex-husband. If a divorced woman saw in a dream that she was looking at several dogs in front of her in the middle of the road and could not Getting rid of her. Here the meaning appears that this divorced woman will face many problems in her professional life during this period and that this issue will bother her a lot. The dreaming divorced woman who sees in a dream that she was running away from big black dogs in a dream, and overtook them in a short time in the dream. And the meaning This is because this divorced woman will get rid of all the bad deeds that she is spending at this time in her life, God willing. Read also: Escaping from a camel in a dream. Interpretation of seeing dogs running in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a person sees a dream in a dream, he sees some big dogs in the dream.

title: The interpretation of seeing a father’s hand kissed in a dream is according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen.

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing one’s father’s hand being kissed in a dream is according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. Kissing the hand is a way of expressing love, care, and appreciation for the other person. Many people kiss their parents' hands to express their love and respect, and seeing kissing hands in a dream is a normal dream but in some cases it is strange and needs interpretation, such as kissing the hand of a deceased parent in reality. life. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing one’s father’s hand kissed in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing one’s father’s hand being kissed in a dream, Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Seeing yourself kissing the maid’s hand in a dream indicates marriage to that lady in reality, God is the Knower of the Unseen. Seeing yourself kissing the hand of a deceased person in a dream symbolizes the benefit of the actions he performed in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing a dead father kissing his hand in a dream. To feel the desire to meet him and accompany him, and God knows best. Dreaming of kissing one’s mother’s hand symbolizes happiness, success, and excellence in work and personal life. The scholar Ibn Sirin interprets seeing one’s father’s hand in a dream as a good and plentiful supply of what is lawful that the dreamer will find in reality. Seeing a man kissing a man’s hand In a dream it means. Based on the person’s requests that he needs from this man who kisses his hand, and God knows best. To see a boy’s hand being kissed in a dream means: about the relationship between the fortuneteller and the child’s father, as well as the good feelings that unite them, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing someone kissing someone’s hand Stranger in a dream. To approach a good person whom the dreamer loves and brings him close to a high degree, and in return extends a helping hand to the dreamer in his life, and God knows best. The dream of kissing someone’s hand is also interpreted as the dreamer’s ability to harm the enemy and achieve what he aspires to. Seeing a woman being kissed in The dream indicates the dreamer’s insistence on reciting the Qur’an and trying to get closer to God Almighty, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams to see a hand being kissed in a dream, interpretation of Al-NabulsiIn the interpretations of the great scholar Al-Nabulsi in a dream of kissing a hand in a dream, there are many connotations and symbols that this vision carries, so what are these meanings? And this is what we present to you as follows: The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a kiss in a dream as the dreamer’s victory over enemies, and God knows best. Seeing the dreamer kissing the boy’s hand in a dream indicates friendship between him and the boy’s father. Seeing kissing the hand of a dead person in a dream means that The dreamer derives knowledge, affection and money in reality, and God knows best. Seeing yourself kissing a dead woman’s hand in a dream indicates goodness, vitality, happiness and blessings that accompany the dreamer’s path in reality. Seeing him kissing his left hand in a dream symbolizes that Almighty God is helping him in meeting his need in reality. And that God is the One who knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a kissing hand in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Shaheen The dream interpretation scholar Ibn Shaheen pointed out many interpretations and interpretations, including: Seeing him kissing the ground in a dream means that the dreamer’s life will be easier, God willing.

title: What is the interpretation of supplication in the rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq?

preview.html: Praying in the rain in a dream Does seeing prayer in the rain portend goodness or illness? What are the negative interpretations of a dream about praying in the rain? What does praying in the rain for the dead symbolize? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of the vision of praying in the rain for single, married, pregnant and divorced women, according to Ibn Sirin and interpretation scholars. Praying in the rain in a dream The interpretation of a dream of begging in the rain suggests that the dreamer will soon achieve his goals and get everything he wants in life, an indication of bad living. And lack of money. Commentators said that if a married man prays to God (the Most High) in his sleep under raindrops, this indicates that his wife will become pregnant soon, especially if she is planning to become pregnant. To the Lord (Glory be to Him) in the mosque and the rain falling in front of him, this symbolizes the relief of distress and the end of worry in a coming tomorrow. Praying in the rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets praying in the rain as a sign of the dreamer’s closeness to God (the Most High), and he performs many Good deeds are to please Him, and if a teenager prays under raindrops, this indicates that he will soon be righteous and will remain. Away from bad friends, and if the dreamer prays in a dark place and hears the sound of rain, this means that he will soon discover some shocking information about someone he knows. Ibn Sirin said that the dreamer who calls upon the Lord (Glory be to Him) while crying and screaming suffers from a bad psychological state and needs to A long period of relaxation to replenish his energy and restore his health. This will happen in his life soon and living conditions will change for the better. Praying in the rain in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq believes that begging in the rain in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s approaching marriage and that he will have a child shortly after marriage, which negatively affects his mental state. If the dreamer is sick and sees Himself asks God Almighty for healing under the raindrops, then this is a sign that he will soon recover from his illness and return to the activities and works that he stopped during the illness, and if a previously unmarried woman pleads to God (Aliya) in her dream, while looking at the rain, this indicates That she will marry a good and kind-hearted man, who will make her happy and do what she wants, and what she wants. Strength to satisfy her.Still not finding an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for the dream interpretation site. Praying in the rain in a dream for single people. Interpretation of the dream of praying in the rain for single people is that God (the Most High) guides her in her life and blesses her with her money, and if the dreamer prays while standing in the rain, this is a sign that he will attend some happy occasions in the coming tomorrow. Even if the dreamer is suffering from a certain experience in her life and dreams that she hears the sound of rain and calls on the Lord (Glory be to Him). This indicates her relief from her distress and the ease of her difficult matters in a short time. Commentators said: If an unmarried woman sees herself praying under raindrops, this means that she will soon hear some good news about a friend of hers, and if the dreamer is suffering from a certain problem at work and sees himself praying In the mosque while at

title: Ibn Sirin's interpretation of the dream of the emergence of a latent state and its implications

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see the latent state of Ibn Sirin, everything a person sees in a dream either symbolizes something that will happen soon or indicates what the sleeper is thinking about what he is going through during his day, that is, there are no dreams they have that have no meaning, and we will also deal with the interpretation of the dream of cumin According to Ibn Sirin, here cumin is a plant that is included in herbal treatment recipes, as it is added to many foods, giving them a pleasant taste. . The cumin plant in a dream has many indicators. Interpretation of a dream about the appearance of a latent state by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a latent state in sleep has many interpretations, and Ibn Sirin interpreted it in more than one interpretation, including good and evil, as he called it a bad dream. Whoever sees that he is eating cumin in his dream, this indicates However, he will achieve what he wants and achieve what he seeks and humanity will come, God willing. Also, if the dreamer is suffering from some health problems and sees that he drank cumin as a drink during his sleep, this indicates that he will soon recover from his problem. Likewise, if the fortuneteller offers cumin to another person It indicates the relationship between them and the goodness in benefiting him from that person. It is possible that the delay in sleeping symbolizes the large number of debts and the doubling of his financial problems. On the other hand, Ibn Sirin said that the delay in the dream symbolizes many good things that he will acquire and with which God will bless him. While if he sees latent time burning during his sleep, it will be a message about the many problems and difficulties in his life that are affecting him negatively. It also says that tracking latency is likely to be good news. Seeing latent time showing signs of damage can be interpreted as... It is a manifestation of the dreamer’s bad morals and repeated sins, or he may be exposed to trouble. See also: Interpretation of a dream about cardamom in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a ring for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a ring for a married woman: Ladies love to buy and own different types and shapes of their own, whether it is gold, silver, or diamonds, and the shapes of rings are varied. We will take care of this in the future, so be sure to follow us. Interpretation of a dream about a ring for a married woman: A ring in a dream for a married woman from the honorable Emirates who holds high positions if the woman works, while the topic may indicate complete stability next to the husband and children and the absence of bad events or problems that appear In the family, sometimes a dream about a ring indicates that the woman will soon receive a high salary during her work, especially if it is a diamond type. One of the most indicative signs of a married woman’s prosperity is that she sees the ring in her vision, and its appearance in the dream portends the woman’s pregnancy as soon as God willing. When she sees A married woman in her dream is that she is wearing a ring. Interpreters believe that she has great self-confidence and does not despair easily, so she falls into it because of her husband and the turbulent relationship between them. Interpretation of a dream about a ring for a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin. The dream of a ring for a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin, symbolizes the concepts of a strong personality and lack of knowledge of her defeat or weakness. Therefore, she tries to work and take care of her family, as she bears many responsibilities. Without getting tired or exhausted, and if she sees a man giving her a precious ring and there is a dispute between them, that distress will end and she will calm down again. One of the most beautiful signs of seeing a ring in a dream for a married woman is that it is a good sign that most of the differences and influences that affect and disturb her are the result of unjust circumstances. Financially well, and she may be thinking about increasing her job and resolving this crisis, or the husband is looking for additional work and the family situation will stabilize soon. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds on the secret dream interpretation site from Google. Interpretation of a dream about a ring for a pregnant woman. The ring in a pregnant woman’s dream highlights meanings that make her beautiful. Very, if she finds that she has a beautiful ring and she is very happy with it and feels joy when wearing it, the matter confirms the health of her fetus and the absence of any problem during her birth, God willing, regardless of the beauty of this child and the feeling of extreme satisfaction when she sees it. The interpretation of a dream about a ring confirms for a pregnant woman that The husband loves her very much and takes into account her psychology and condition if she sees that he gave her the ring and it was expensive and beautiful. Early. Interpreters point out some symbols specific to the sex of the fetus for the pregnant woman who sees the ring in the vision, where the ring studded with diamonds is a sign of the girl’s condition, but if small and colored stones appear, it becomes clear that she will. She will give birth to a son, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a golden ring for a married woman. Interpretations of seeing a golden ring in a dream for a married woman vary, and some indicate that it indicates material gains and goodness, while a group of interpretation scholars oppose this interpretation and confirm that the golden ring indicates a lack of health and money and distance from Goodness, meaning that the person who has the vision is at risk of failure or loss, and God forbid, and hence the loss of the golden ring is one of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a white owl and a black owl in a dream

preview.html: We interpret the dream of a black and white owl. The meanings of the owl if it is colored, black, or white in the dream. The white owl in a dream is a symbol of insight and deep thoughts, and in the dream it is one of the symbols of a person who is able to live his life with confidence and insight. It can indicate new ideas, and the dreamer who appears with an owl White in his dream is the owner of a creative mind and a transparent soul, influenced by the simplest things and above all wise. If you see a white owl flying in the dark, know that one day you will meet success or perhaps you will achieve success that you never imagined. If a white owl enters your home, know that you will receive Good news or you are experiencing a good event related to your work, your general environment, or an activity in which you are involved. Perhaps the dream indicates peace of mind and calm after a violent wave of fluctuations or conflicts. The black owl in a dream is a symbol of death and only negative connotations for the varying, but the black owl can be considered a guardian of the underworld. The black owl in a dream is a symbol of an introverted personality who is unable to achieve self-realization or earn a living except Through isolation, and its black color reflects the nature of cruelty or strictness that the owner of the vision sometimes imposes on himself. A black owl in a dream can look at you with a sharp eye, and this look can serve as a warning against falling into a trap or traps prepared by an enemy who competes with you or competes with you. It shows Seeing a black owl in the dark of the night indicates the strength of your insight and the depth of your soul that yearns for creativity, creativity, or immortality. If you see a black owl at home, it means that you have some fear of the unknown or it is negative energy in your soul that you did not spend on positive matters. Perhaps a black owl in your house indicates that you will have a failed romantic adventure or something similar. A colored album in a dream symbolizes deception or cunning and expresses false ideas and beliefs. It may just be a hint that there are some insincere feelings that others are trying to show towards you, whether it is Greed, fear, or hypocrisy. Whether the owl in the dream is black, white, or colorful, this is a symbol that we must pay great attention to because many cultures have paid a lot of attention to this creature. For the Greeks, it is wise and philosophical. In Asian cultures, it symbolizes death or resurrection, and in the West, it is a symbol of optimism and success. Interpretation of seeing an owl - YouTube

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a full barbecue party according to Ibn Sirin in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing barbecue in a dream, which was completed by Ibn Sirin? Roasting in a dream indicates many meanings, including those related to victory and overcoming difficulties, including those related to defeat and control, as well as what is related to it. the solution. Problems and the disappearance of worries, some of which indicate the concentration of many difficulties, which in turn will lead to many problems. The type and condition of the scenes and the events of the dream. Interpretation varies, so before interpretation you must know many things about the dreamer. What is the interpretation of a dream about barbecue in a dream? Where interpretation differs Depending on the dreamer’s condition and according to the details of the dream, what is the interpretation of a man’s dream of barbecue different from a woman’s vision, and a human’s vision is not the same vision. A married woman, a pregnant woman, a married woman, a married woman and a divorced woman are not equal. Barbecue in a dream generally indicates victory, avoiding defeat, overcoming injustice, and earning a lot of halal money through profitable trade, and sometimes it indicates feeding a newborn, and it is also possible that the dream is an indication of the approaching Wedding date. Sometimes a dream shows victory, such as a man dreaming that he is grilling his grandfather, and sometimes grilling in a dream shows a large diet and he has a lot of money and he sees a married man eating meat on the grill. The interpretation of this dream varies from one world to another and from one case to another, and the interpretation varies. Ibn Sirin from Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation, and both differ from Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation. The interpretation of seeing a barbecue in a dream was completed by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a barbecue in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates the beginning of a new, relatively stable life and the possession of a lot of money. It also indicates the following: Seeing the same dreamer roasting a weak sheep in a dream means that he will earn a little money, but after a long and hard effort. Eating a roasted lamb in a dream is evidence that the dreamer’s son or daughter will earn a lot of money. Roasting a whole lamb indicates in A dream generally means making money, but after a lot of trouble and great effort. Anyone who sees himself grilling whole meat in his dream and eating it is a sign of owning a large amount of halal money through a profitable business. Seeing green grilled meat indicates that the dreamer is going through a period Difficult, full of many difficulties and pain. Completely roasting birds in a dream is a clear indication that you will earn a lot of money without any effort or fatigue. What is the interpretation of a dream when you see a barbecue party for Al-Nabulsi? According to Al-Nabulsi, the interpretation of a dream about interrogation is slightly different from the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, where Al-Nabulsi said: Seeing barbecue in a dream generally means victory and overcoming difficulties. A roasted goat in a dream indicates that there are many family and marital problems surrounding the dreamer, but he will overcome them soon. Roasting whole birds in a dream is a clear indication that you are earning a lot of money. , but without making any effort. Al-Nabulsi said that roasting a whole lamb in a dream is a sign of the financial difficulties that the dreamer is going through, but they will end by God’s will. What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing a whole barbecue in a dream?

title: Interpretation of a dream about the month of Dhul-Qa’dah in a dream

preview.html:
Interpretation of seeing a dream about the month of Dhul-Qi’dah in a dream. There are many dreams that a person dreams of during his sleep. There are disturbing dreams that worry the person, and there are also dreams that comfort the person and make him feel comfortable. In both cases, the person wants to interpret the dream that he sees to determine the effects and meanings that the dream carries. But interpretations and contents of dreams vary depending on the social status of the individual, and there are many leading scholars. Who have interpreted many dreams, and here is the interpretation of seeing a dream about the month of Dhul-Qa’dah in a dream.Interpretation of seeing the month of Dhul-Qa’dah in a dreamDreaming about one of the months is one of the wondrous things that a person wants to know its interpretation, and dreaming about the month of Dhul-Qa’dah is one of the things that arouses the dreamer’s curiosity in its interpretation, since the month of Dhul-Qa’dah. Sitting.
Dul Kanda is one of the holy months in which good deeds are multiplied, and the interpretation of seeing the month of Dul ​​Kanda in a dream is: Dreaming of the month of Dhul-Qa’dah in a dream indicates a feeling of sadness. Seeing a married woman in the month of Dhul-Qa’dah in a dream is evidence of fear. What is the interpretation of seeing the months in Dream? Interpretations of the months vary depending on the month that the person saw in the dream. The meaning and symbol of one month differs from one another. There are many people who dream about the Hijri and Gregorian months, and the interpretation of the Gregorian months differs from the Hijri months, and the interpretation of the months in a dream is: If you see a dream about the month of Rabi’ al-Thani in a dream, this means that you will get rid of the worries and anxiety that are passing. The interpretation of the dream of seeing the other spring explains food. If you see a dream about the month of Jumada al-Awwal, this means postponing travel, rest, and avoiding exhaustion. A dream about the month of Jumada al-Akhir shows a feeling of sadness and repentance for sins, and bliss and goodness prevail in his life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the month of Dhul-Hijjah in a dream. The month of Dhul-Hijjah in the Hijri calendar is one of the great months, One of its days coincides with the performance of the Hajj rituals, and one of the Muslim holidays is Eid al-Adha. Seeing the month of Dhul-Hijjah in a dream has many connotations and meanings for whoever sees it, and the interpretation of his dream of seeing the month of Dhul-Hijjah is: Sometimes, seeing the month of Dhul-Qa’dah means dismissal from work. The person who saw the month of Dhul-Hijjah had the opportunity to travel. If the dreamer sees Eid prayer Al-Adha in the month of Dhul-Hijjah, the interpretation of the dream is repentance to God Almighty. Seeing the annual calendar in one dreamWhen an unmarried woman dreams in a dream during her sleep, she feels curious about the interpretation of the dream, and the interpretation of seeing the dream of an unmarried girl is different from that of a married woman and the annual calendar, Whether in Hijri or Gregorian terms. Each of them has a special meaning, and one of the dreams that many people want to interpret is seeing the annual calendar in one dream: Seeing the patient’s annual diary in a dream indicates recovery, God willing. Interpretation of the annual calendar in a person’s dream shows anxiety and a feeling of fear and tension. Seeing a seeker of knowledge in a dream means Anxiety and a feeling of fear of not getting high grades in studies. The great interpreters Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, Al-Nabulsi and others interpreted many dreams, and explained the connection
